name: readeo
overview:
Readeo provides a service called BookChat that lets friends and family read stories together no matter how far apart they are.

Using digital childrenâ€™s books and streaming video chat, BookChatting allows users to see, hear, and interact with one another as they would if they were reading in person.

Publisher partners include Simon & Schuster, Candlewick Press, Chronicle Books, and Blue Apple Books.
